# HandSkeleton.Joint

**Structure**

The name and position of an individual hand joint.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Joint
```

## Inspecting hand joints

- **name**: A name that uniquely identifies this joint among others on the same skeleton.
- **parentJoint**: The joint that’s connected to this joint and more closely connected to the base of the skeleton.

## Tracking the position of hand joints

- **anchorFromJointTransform**: The position and orientation of this joint relative to the base joint of the skeleton.
- **parentFromJointTransform**: The transform from the joint to its parent joint’s coordinate system.
- **isTracked**: A Boolean value that indicates whether ARKit tracks a hand joint.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of this joint.

## Retrieving specific hand joints

- **joint(_:)**: Retrieves a hand joint based on the joint name you specify.
- **HandSkeleton.JointName**: The names of different hand joints.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
